entry.key: Attributes to add to the HTTP Response (Regex)

value.name: Attributes to add to the HTTP Response (Regex)

entry.key: Attributes to add to the HTTP Response (Regex)

entry.value: SELECT PATIENTID as PatientNumber, 'Hopital 1' as Hospital, BIRTHDATE as DateOfBirth, GENDER as Gender, '' as PatientDeceased, DEATH_DATE as DateofDeath, '' as PlaceOfBirth, '' as EthnicOrigin, NATIONALITY as Nationality, SUBSTRING(PATIENT_NAME, 1, POSITION(' ' IN PATIENT_NAME) - 1) AS LastName, SUBSTRING(PATIENT_NAME, POSITION(' ' IN PATIENT_NAME) + 1) AS FirstName, MARITALSTATUS as Title, '' as MothersName, '' as MothersPreName, '' as FathersName, '' as FathersPreName, '' as FamilyDoctor, NATIONALID as NationalID, '' as FileDateCreation FROM FLOWFILE
